title: Welcome to the clearsight wallet
access-to-crypto-description: You Deserve Easy Access to Cryptocurrencies
access-to-crypto-text: ClearSight’s Wallet is your most trusted and secure crypto wallet.This virtual wallet allows users to store their cryptocurrencies and connect them with our debit cards and access it from the comfort of their couch.
access-to-crypto-title-two: Completely secure, audit done once weekly.
access-to-crypto-title-four: Directly connected with your own clearsight debit card.
buy-crypto-text: Buying crypto so you can hire freelancers has never been easier,quick and simple method has been created for you to be able to buy over 5000 cryptocurrencies with your credit/debit cards, almost every international cards are accepted.
exchange-instantly-text: You can also Swap and exchange cryptocurrencies on the wallet, nothing to worry about if you’ve bought the wrong crypto, we got your back.The fees are super low thanks to our exchange partners, and also exchanging the currencies is instant.
gs-first-card-description: We have both iOS and Android apps available for you.
gs-second-card-description: Most credit/debit cards are accepted, KYC and AML are mandatory for all purchases above 1000$
gs-third-card-description: Hire the talent and pay them via crypto, fee-less.
